title: Troopers Warn Motorists to be Alert Around School Buses and School Zones (Georgia Department of ...
text: ( Source : Georgia Department of Public Safety ) ( Atlanta ) - As students begin to return to the classroom for the new school year, the Georgia State Patrol is reminding motorists to use caution when driving near school bus stops and in school
